attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tony Blair as "Prime Minister" has become an acute embarrassment to Great Britain. He has no authority, his party ignore him and other words leaders at best treat him with pity.

He is a lame duck - unable to drive through any substantive policies. The government and country are rudderless and leaderless while we await his resignation.

He should just go - now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
